meanings.definition: The act of making something blue.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the bluings of her paintings.
meanings.sent2: The bluings of the sky at sunset were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The bluings of the ocean made it look like a giant blueberry smoothie.
meanings.sent4: His bluings of sadness were evident in his melancholic artwork.
meanings.sent5: The bluings of the flowers in the garden added a serene touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A substance used to make something blue.
meanings.sent1: The artist mixed different bluings to create the perfect shade.
meanings.sent2: She bought various bluings from the art store for her project.
meanings.sent3: The bluings spilled on the canvas, creating a beautiful mess.
meanings.sent4: The bluings transformed the plain fabric into a vibrant masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The bluings in the bottle were waiting to bring color to the world.
